'''Imminent Triumph''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[City of Winds and Idylls]]''.

It was featured in an animated cutscene from the [[Archon Quest]] ''[[Dragon Storm]]'' and a dialogue scene in ''[[Shadow Over Mondstadt]]'' (plays until the player logs out or exits the [[Knights of Favonius Headquarters]]).
